```{r}
library(hexSticker)
sticker("inst/png/etl_logo.png",
        package = "etl", p_size = 0, s_x = 1.1, s_y = 1,
        s_width = .6, s_height = .6,
        h_fill = "black", h_color = "red",
        filename = "inst/png/etl_hex.png")
```
